response.overview: A story inspired by a fairy tale written by a sister to her imprisoned brother in Belarus â€” a country where he remains behind bars on political charges. Political prisoners in Belarusian prisons are often deprived of phone calls and visits. A care package is sometimes the only link to the outside world. In this story, the package comes to life and sets out on its own journey to the prison to reach the inmate.
response.title: The Care Package
